description:
Let me introduce myself. My name is Kannicha . you can call me Fang. I live in Chiangmai,Thailand. My hobbies is cooking thai food. I started cooking since i was 12 years old.My mother is chef in Chiangmai .She teach all about cooking for me. Everyday i cook thai food delivered to colleague. Today I teach you made Khow Niaow Ma Muang or Mango with sticky rice and coconut sauce .I guide equipment for Khow Niaow Ma Muang or Mango with sticky rice .

you can take mango with sticky rice yourself .

This course teach you step by step.

You can make mango sticky rice for your family or your friends.

**** please 1 comments for watching
title: Thai dessert
